channel.title: Comments on: The Raver and the Bear

item.title: By: I do not know what a DJ is, and a squirrel pretending to be a bear attacked me. | Hello, I am a bear
item.dc:creator: I do not know what a DJ is, and a squirrel pretending to be a bear attacked me. | Hello, I am a bear
item.description: […] (the squirrel) said I had to try this game he found. It was called “The Raver and the Bear.” Rob (the squirrel) said I would love it because he knew how much I liked to rave, which I assume […]
